apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji captures a romantic embrace between a man with a medium-light skin tone and a woman with a medium-dark skin tone, their lips meeting in a tender kiss. Apple's characteristic glossy shading and smooth gradients give their faces a lifelike quality and a soft, inviting appearance, highlighting the connection between them. The gentle curvature of their forms and the subtle blush on their cheeks underscore the warmth and affection, perfect for conveying romantic feelings or a loving gesture.
